column4: Okey doke, I've got the right shebang, for lisp but if I run my program in Terminal I just get an empty terminal with a blinking cursor. What does this suggest?
Is this the right format for the shebang? #!interpreter [/usr/bin/clisp]
that depends on where you installed it.  type: which clisp
I found clisp, it appears to be the right place
